request-map.description: This request is to show the Salary Structure for a given partyId as parameter.
This request is to show the Preview of the Salary Structure created for a party. It is cached in session. It would only be store if the user clicks on the Create button show in the same page.
This request is to show the Preview of the Salary Structure created for a party. It is cached in session. It would only be store if the user clicks on the Create button show in the same page.
This request is to show the Salary Structure for a given partyId as parameter.
This request is to show the Salary Structure for a given partyId as parameter.
This request would take the salary structure available in the session for a party and store it in Database. This would be execute after preview of the SalaryStructure.
